description: Most brews encourage playing with temperature and ingredients when crafting them, rewarding with a potent drink more directly impactful (yet fun) than that of teas.
All alchohols brewed in the keg gives the tipsy effect, which will ramp up in severity the more brews you drink.
Ices and Magma are the best temp blocks, and the temperature is indicated by the 5-bit bar in the keg gui! They must be placed in a 3x3 area around the keg.
The satisfaction effect will cause hunger to regenerate like health would.
The Sweet Heart effect increases incoming healing amounts.
